name: Kong Run - A Jungle adventure
description:
Kong Run - A banana adventure is a simple and fun game.

In the theme of an unlimited running game, but is fu of excitement.

You need to help Kong to collect as many banana as his can. And you will be reward a score that calculated base on the number of bananas and the distance Kong has run. The more the better.

Please tap the screen to jump and go as far a you could.

This is an exciting and addicted game at the same time.

Have fun and don't for get to rate and review.
